ygData.subject: Re: AE damage
ygData.msgSnippet: ... EMH1.ARMY.MIL ... Any AE damage spell will harm the caster if casted too close. The worst offender I know of is a warrior sword.
ygData.messageBody:
>Message: 21
> Date: Tue, 26 Oct 1999 16:08:59 -1000
> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4"
<g4mntofcr@SCHOFIELD->EMH1.ARMY.MIL>
>Subject: RE: Level 43 song - Desperate Dirge
>
>I haven't played any other class except a bard so I'm
>not familiar with
>all
>the spells out there. Do other classes have spells
>that can accidently
>cause damage to them like the Dirge can for bards?
>
>Galtin of E'ci



Any AE damage spell will harm the caster if casted too
close. The worst offender I know of is a warrior
sword. Bladestorm: Katana of Steel Sleet. When it
procs (it does now, they fixed it) you take ~850dmg
from the AE spell. You can't avoid the proc, it's a
sword...



Double
Antonican Bard of 18 Songs

=====
